name: haashim-cv-website
description: Haashim Alvi's personal CV website built with Astro and TypeScript
author: Haashim Alvi <haashimalvi@pm.me>

scripts.build:verbose: npm run validate:data && npm run build
scripts.test:api: echo 'üîç Testing API Endpoints...' && curl -s https://haashim-alvi.netlify.app/api/cv.json | python3 -c "import json, sys; data = json.load(sys.stdin); print('‚úÖ JSON API: Valid'); print(f'  - Projects: {len(data[\"projects\"])}'); print(f'  - Skills: {len(data[\"skills\"])} categories'); print(f'  - Experience: {len(data[\"experience\"])} roles')" && curl -s https://haashim-alvi.netlify.app/sitemap.xml | grep -c '<url>' | xargs -I {} echo '‚úÖ Sitemap: {} URLs found' && curl -s https://haashim-alvi.netlify.app/rss.xml | grep -c '<item>' | xargs -I {} echo '‚úÖ RSS Feed: {} items found' && echo 'üéâ All endpoints working!'
